summary: 1996  was a leap year starting on Monday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
1996  was a leap year starting on Monday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1996th year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 996th year of the 2nd millennium, the 96th year of the 20th century, and the 7th year of the 1990s decade.
1996 was designated as:
International Year for the Eradication of Poverty
